description: Update the answer to a specific question in a workload review.

parameters.name: WorkloadId
parameters.description: The ID assigned to the workload. This ID is unique within an Amazon Web Services Region.

parameters.name: LensAlias
parameters.description: The alias of the lens. For Amazon Web Services official lenses, this is either the lens alias, such as serverless, or the lens ARN, such as arn:aws:wellarchitected:us-east-1::lens/serverless. Note that some operations (such as ExportLens and CreateLensShare) are not permitted on Amazon Web Services official lenses. For custom lenses, this is the lens ARN, such as arn:aws:wellarchitected:us-west-2:123456789012:lens/0123456789abcdef01234567890abcdef. Each lens is identified by its  LensSummary$LensAlias.

parameters.name: SelectedChoices
parameters.description: List of selected choice IDs in a question answer. The values entered replace the previously selected choices. (string) --- The ID of a choice.

parameters.name: ChoiceUpdates
parameters.description: A list of choices to update on a question in your workload. The String key corresponds to the choice ID to be updated. (string) --- The ID of a choice. (dict) --- A list of choices to be updated. The status of a choice. Reason (string) --- The reason why a choice is non-applicable to a question in your workload. Notes (string) --- The notes associated with a choice.

nested_params.name: Reason
nested_params.description: The reason why a choice is non-applicable to a question in your workload.

nested_params.name: Notes
nested_params.description: The notes associated with a choice.

parameters.name: Notes
parameters.description: The notes associated with the workload. For a review template, these are the notes that will be associated with the workload when the template is applied.

nested_items.name: WorkloadId
nested_items.description: The ID assigned to the workload. This ID is unique within an Amazon Web Services Region.

nested_items.description: The URLs for additional resources, either helpful resources or improvement plans, for a custom lens. Up to five additional URLs can be specified.
